722696f.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 72nd Street
722696f.text:
Identification: Hudson River monument, Riverside Drive \&
72d St. Designed by Allen G. Newman, Sc.
Cast by Jno. Williams, Inc.
Date: 1909
Photographer: A.B.Sogart, 80 E. 14th St.

722694f.text:

722695f.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 72nd Street (West)
722695f.text:
Riverside Drive and Park, north fromm West 72nd Street. The
spacious home at the right fs the Charles M. Schwab mansion. This
occupies the entire block bounded y the Drtve, West End Avenue,
between 73rd and 74th Streets. Beyond, are the 12-story Lombard
(erected 1907- 4), No. 332 West End Avenue and the massive Athorpe
Apartments (erected 192e-5), No. 2201-17 Broadway. Construction
of the latter date thisjview.
